name: reusable-project-template
description: A reusable template with React + Vite, Tailwind CSS 3, shadcn/ui, Bun/Express, and Prisma ORM

scripts.dev: bun run dev:frontend & bun run dev:server & wait
scripts.check-env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const envVars = ['VITE_API_URL', 'PORT', 'VITE_PORT', 'NODE_ENV']; const envFileExists = fs.existsSync(path.join(__dirname, '.env')); const conflicting = envVars.filter(key => process.env[key] && envFileExists); if (conflicting.length) { console.error('⚠️  Warning: These environment variables are set in your shell:'); console.error('   ' + conflicting.join(', ')); console.error(''); console.error('This may override your .env file values!'); console.error(''); console.error('To fix, run: unset ' + conflicting.join(' ')); console.error(''); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ No conflicting shell environment variables detected'); console.log('   Safe to start PM2 processes'); }"
scripts.pm2:dev:safe: bun run check-env && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.pm2:prod:safe: bun run check-env && pm2 start ecosystem.production.config.cjs --env production
